title: Process an Off-Cycle Bonus Payment
description: A manager has approved a spot bonus for an employee that needs to be paid outside of the regular payroll cycle.

tasks.description: Receive the approved bonus details (employee, amount, reason).
tasks.expected_outcome: Payroll specialist confirms the approved bonus information.

tasks.description: Enter the bonus payment into the payroll system as an off-cycle payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist correctly enters the bonus details for processing.

tasks.description: Run the off-cycle payroll and verify the net pay and tax calculations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist processes the payment and confirms the calculations are correct before finalizing.
